info.title: Data views
info.description: OpenAPI schema for data view endpoints

tags.name: data views
tags.description: Data view APIs enable you to manage data views, formerly known as Kibana index patterns.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of all data views.
get.description: This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release. Elastic will apply best effort to fix any issues, but features in technical preview are not subject to the support SLA of official GA features.

get.summary: Retrieves a single data view by identifier.
get.description: This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release. Elastic will apply best effort to fix any issues, but features in technical preview are not subject to the support SLA of official GA features.

This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release. Elastic will apply best effort to fix any issues, but features in technical preview are not subject to the support SLA of official GA features.

get_data_views_response.summary: Retrieve the list of data views for Kibana sample data.

get_data_view_response.summary: Retrieve information about a specific data view.

get_runtime_field_response.summary: Retrieve a runtime field named `hour_of_day` from the data view `d3d7af60-4c81-11e8-b3d7-01146121b73d`.

view_id.name: viewId
view_id.description: An identifier for the data view.

field_name.name: fieldName
field_name.description: The name of the runtime field.
